feedback.description: provide feedback to the CLI team

login.description: create a new profile to store Twilio Account credentials and configuration

auth-token.name: auth-token
auth-token.description: Your Twilio Auth Token for your Twilio Account or Subaccount.

silent.name: silent
silent.description: Suppress output and logs. This is a shorthand for "-l none -o none".

args.name: account-sid
args.description: The Account SID for your Twilio Account or Subaccount.

silent.name: silent
silent.description: Suppress output and logs. This is a shorthand for "-l none -o none".

email:send.description: sends emails to single or multiple recipients using Twilio SendGrid

to.name: to
to.description: Email address of recipient (for multiple email addresses separate each email with a comma).

subject.name: subject
subject.description: The subject line for an email.

text.name: text
text.description: Text to send within the email body.

attachment.name: attachment
attachment.description: Path for the file that you want to attach.

no-attachment.name: no-attachment
no-attachment.description: Do not include or prompt for an attachment.

silent.name: silent
silent.description: Suppress output and logs. This is a shorthand for "-l none -o none".

email:set.description: sets a default sending email address and subject line

from.name: from
from.description: Default email address of the sender

subject.name: subject
subject.description: Default subject line for all emails

phone-numbers:list.description: show what Twilio phone numbers you have configured

properties.name: properties
properties.description: The incomingPhoneNumber object properties you would like to display (JSON output always shows all properties).

silent.name: silent
silent.description: Suppress output and logs. This is a shorthand for "-l none -o none".

account-sid.name: account-sid
account-sid.description: Access resources for the specified account.

phone-numbers:update.description: update the properties of a Twilio phone number

friendly-name.name: friendly-name
friendly-name.description: A human readable descriptive text for this resource, up to 64 characters long.

sms-url.name: sms-url
sms-url.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody sends an SMS to the new phone number.

sms-method.name: sms-method
sms-method.description: The HTTP method Twilio will use when making requests to the SmsUrl.

sms-fallback-url.name: sms-fallback-url
sms-fallback-url.description: A URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by SmsUrl.

sms-fallback-method.name: sms-fallback-method
sms-fallback-method.description: The HTTP method that should be used to request the SmsFallbackUrl.

voice-url.name: voice-url
voice-url.description: The URL that Twilio should request when somebody dials the phone number.

voice-method.name: voice-method
voice-method.description: The HTTP method Twilio will use when making requests to the VoiceUrl.

voice-fallback-url.name: voice-fallback-url
voice-fallback-url.description: A URL that Twilio will request if an error occurs requesting or executing the TwiML defined by VoiceUrl.

voice-fallback-method.name: voice-fallback-method
voice-fallback-method.description: The HTTP method Twilio will use when requesting the VoiceFallbackUrl.

silent.name: silent
silent.description: Suppress output and logs. This is a shorthand for "-l none -o none".

account-sid.name: account-sid
account-sid.description: Access resources for the specified account.

args.name: phone-number
args.description: The SID or E.164 formatted phone number you wish to update.

profiles:create.description: create a new profile to store Twilio Account credentials and configuration

auth-token.name: auth-token
auth-token.description: Your Twilio Auth Token for your Twilio Account or Subaccount.

args.name: account-sid

debugger:logs:list.description:
Show a list of log events generated for the account

Argg, this is only a subset of the log events and live tailing isn't quite ready! Think this is a killer feature? Let us know here: https://twil.io/twilio-cli-feedback

properties.name: properties
properties.description: The event properties you would like to display (JSON output always shows all properties)

log-level.name: log-level
log-level.description: Only show log events for this log level

start-date.name: start-date
start-date.description: Only show log events on or after this date

end-date.name: end-date
end-date.description: Only show log events on or before this date

silent.name: silent
silent.description: Suppress output and logs. This is a shorthand for "-l none -o none".
